title: Paramount to pay $16M to settle Trump suit over '60 Minutes' interview
shortDescription: Paramount said it would pay $16 million to settle the lawsuit, with the money allocated to Donald Trump's future presidential library.

title: Trump urges Hamas to accept 'final proposal' for 60-day Gaza ceasefire
shortDescription: Trump said Israel has agreed to the conditions to finalize a 60-day ceasefire, "during which time we will work with all parties to end the War."

title: Zohran Mamdani responds to Trump's threat to arrest him
shortDescription: Mamdani, the Democratic nominee for mayor of New York City and a state Assembly member, called the threat "an attack on our democracy."

title: Trump says daughter-in-law 'first choice' to replace Tillis in Senate
shortDescription: "Somebody who would really be great is Lara, she grew up there," Trump said of his daughter-in-law in discussing the North Carolina Senate seat.

title: Medicare vs. Medicaid: What to know after cuts pass the Senate
shortDescription: The so-called "One, Big Beautiful Bill," spanning over 900 pages, includes the largest cuts to Medicaid in the program's 50-plus years. What to know.

title: Dems blast GOP Senators for passing spending bill
shortDescription: Democrats sharply criticized GOP Senators for passing President Donald Trump's "Big Beautiful Bill."

title: Trump: CNN may be prosecuted for reporting on ICE sighting app
shortDescription: DHS Secretary Kristi Noem said the Trump administration is exploring prosecuting CNN for reporting on an app that alerts users to nearby ICE agents.

title: Trump calls Biden a 'son of a b----' as he tours 'Alligator Alcatraz'

title: Senate passes President Trump's policy bill
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's amended bill was narrowly passed by the Senate, with Vice President JD Vance's vote breaking the 50-50 tie.

title: Vance: Medicaid cuts in tax bill 'immaterial' compared to ICE increase
shortDescription: Vice President JD Vance said cuts to Medicaid and budget impacts in the Senate tax bill don't compare to the importance of ICE spending.

title: Frustrated House Republicans prepare to tackle Trump's tax bill
shortDescription: A handful of key House Republicans have already indicated they have frustrations with the Senate-passed bill.

title: Trump's big bill is a win. But it could also be a big problem for GOP
shortDescription: A Republican senator who was slammed by Trump after opposing his bill won't seek reelection. Another said the bill is testing the "soul" of the GOP.

title: NOAA budget mirrors Trump plan, reduces spending and staff
shortDescription: A detailed expense budget for NOAA outlines plans to reduce spending and cut climate and atmospheric research.

title: Which Senate Republicans voted against Trump's tax and spending bill?
shortDescription: GOP Sens. Rand Paul of Kentucky and Thom Tillis of North Carolina earlier voted no but the surprise was Susan Collins of Maine also opposed it.

title: Senate gives Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' a thumbs up: 5 takeaways

title: Trump tours 'Alligator Alcatraz' immigration detention center

title: How do Americans feel about Trump on immigration? What recent polls show
